divs: sighting detailsas these transformers blow if you look in the sky and at about one minute and 55 seconds into this you will some orbs not sure what to make of it but would like someone else to comment on it to see what they think. not sure if it is just from the transformers but it the only time you see them and they appear to move. *(link moved to additional evidence section--cms\sg).
